content: I have fallen in the past year
reason: People who have fallen once are likely to fall again

content: Sometimes I feel unsteady when I am walking
reason: Unsteadiness or needing support while walking are signs of poor balance
People who are worried about falling are more likely to fall

content: I use or have been advised to use a cane or walker to get around safely
reason: People who have been advised to use a cane or walker may already be more likely to fall

content: I steady myself by holding onto furniture when walking at home
reason: Unsteadiness or needing support while walking are signs of poor balance

content: I need to push with my hands to stand up from a chair
reason: This is a sign of weak leg muscles, a major reason for falling

content: I have some trouble stepping up onto a curb
reason: This is a sign of weak leg muscles, a major reason for falling

content: I often have to rush to the toilet
reason: Rushing to the bathroom, especially at night, increases your chance of falling

content: I have lost some feeling in my feet
reason: Numbness in your feet can cause stumbles and lead to falls

content: I take medicine that sometimes makes me feel light-headed or more tired than usual
reason: Side effects from medicines can sometimes increase your chance of falling

content: I take medicine to help me sleep or improve my mood
reason: These medicines can sometimes increase your chance of falling

content: I often feel sad or depressed
reason: Symptoms of depression, such as not feeling well or feeling slowed down, are linked to falls
